entry.title: https://github.com/Byaidu/PDFMathTranslate

entry.title: https://github.com/jumpserver/jumpserver
entry.content: JumpServer is an open-source Privileged Access Management (PAM) tool that provides DevOps and IT teams with on-demand and secure access to SSH, RDP, Kubernetes, Database and RemoteApp endpoints through a web browser.
